name: Companies with new-to-market product innovation, by innovation R&D activity: 2016–18
description: Companies with new-to-market product innovation, by innovation R&D activity: 2016–18

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_product_innovation_new_to_market_number_yes
variableMeasured.description: Product Innovation New To Market Number Yes

variableMeasured.name: field_product_innovation_new_to_market_number_no
variableMeasured.description: Product Innovation New To Market Number No

variableMeasured.name: field_product_innovation_new_to_market_percent_yes
variableMeasured.description: Product Innovation New To Market Percent Yes

variableMeasured.name: field_product_innovation_new_to_market_percent_no
variableMeasured.description: Product Innovation New To Market Percent No

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Innovation R&D activity is based on unedited company responses to innovation questions, not R&D expenditures. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, 2019 Annual Business Survey: Data Year 2018.
